data.name: Smash Drums
data.description:
Get ready to ROCK and DRUM HARD in this unique VR and MR rhythm game!

❤️‍🔥 **NEW:** 1970s, 1980s, and Punk Rock Legends additional music packs (*)

🎨 **NEW:** Mixed Reality paint shop mode (**)

Embark on an epic drumming journey that will have you destroying multiple environments through chaos and flames! Be prepared to smash drums to 58 great rock songs, and more to come!

This is Smash Drums! 
Rock & roll has never been more alive...

**KEY FEATURES**

● Unique, intensity-based gameplay: tap the crystal drums and SMASH the hell out of the burning drums!

● Smash down 9 environments in single-player mode, including: a prison, a rock show… and the Moon!

● Multiplayer arena (2-8 drummers): rule over the Co-op and Versus modes;

● Live Ranking: watch yourself climb up the leaderboards as you play (global or friends);

● Unlock tracks, skins & achievements

🔥 AIXR 2021 “VR Game of the Year” finalist

(*) Additional purchases required

(**) Mixed Reality mode displays black & white passthrough footage on Meta Quest 2

Patch! (v2.3.2)
🐜 Fixes a super rare and nasty bug (5 players affected in the last 6 months) where the save file would be corrupted when saving (e.g. dead battery when saving), recovering it from the leaderboards entries if necessary. Previously, an affected player had to email us, then sideload the recovered save file: now, it is recovered in-game if needed (internet connection required for the recovery). And it shouldn't happen anymore anyway, as save files are also backed up locally, prior to being overwritten. No more super rare and nasty bug! Yay!
